body:
The idea is to write up a post regarding all the major ruqqus milestones and happenings of 2020.

Accompanying this post could be a static webpage similar to https://dribbble.com/year/2018.

For events, so far I've got the beta launch, broccoli meme, merch launch, Heroku kicking, CBS, knowyourmeme, API launch, and the reddit ban wave. But I know I'm forgetting some things.

Ideas? What would you like to see? Thanks!

body:
I'd like to see a small in-person gathering with photos just to make a point, even if it's just a handful of people.

You know, I'm counting on each of you to self-quarantine for requisite days in advance and afterward, so you can be in exclusive bubble pods with each other and not need to wear masks.

In case you start kissing and stuff.

post.body:
The idea is to write up a post regarding all the major ruqqus milestones and happenings of 2020.

Accompanying this post could be a static webpage similar to https://dribbble.com/year/2018.

For events, so far I've got the beta launch, broccoli meme, merch launch, Heroku kicking, CBS, knowyourmeme, API launch, and the reddit ban wave. But I know I'm forgetting some things.

Ideas? What would you like to see? Thanks!

body: No Heroku was the only company that kicked us, and then we migrated to AWS. There was an attempt to migrate to AWS before then but that was reverted. The only other changes we've had is a switch from domain registrar from Google Domains to another registrar but we were not kicked.

Accompanying this post could be a static webpage similar to https://dribbble.com/year/2018.

For events, so far I've got the beta launch, broccoli meme, merch launch, Heroku kicking, CBS, knowyourmeme, API launch, and the reddit ban wave. But I know I'm forgetting some things.

Ideas? What would you like to see? Thanks!

body:
Not sure if relevant, but maybe +RuqES could be mentioned? It's been maintained/improved for like half a year, adds tons of features.

It has grown from 250 lines of code with only simple expando button and few embeds to over 6 thousands LoC supporting dozens of features like infinite scroll, favorite guilds, uploading images in post creation, saving of posts and comments, preview in post/comment creation, many new embeds (e.g. BitChute, Lbry, Odysee, Steam, Imgur album and gallery, meta), tons of visual customizations (thumbnail size and icons, various forms of expando button unfolding, image resizing, up/down-vote counts), download button, post rules and many more.
body_html:

post.body:
The idea is to write up a post regarding all the major ruqqus milestones and happenings of 2020.

Accompanying this post could be a static webpage similar to https://dribbble.com/year/2018.

For events, so far I've got the beta launch, broccoli meme, merch launch, Heroku kicking, CBS, knowyourmeme, API launch, and the reddit ban wave. But I know I'm forgetting some things.

Ideas? What would you like to see? Thanks!
